title: Skip Beat!, Vol. 46
description: When Kyoko’s heart is broken, she decides that revenge is a dish best served in the spotlight!Kyoko Mogami followed her true love Sho to Tokyo to support him while he made it big as an idol. But he’s casting her out now that he’s famous! Kyoko won’t suffer in silence—she’s going to get her sweet revenge by beating Sho in show biz!Ren Tsuruga loves Kyoko Mogami! It’s the news of the century, but they have to keep it quiet to protect their privacy and their careers. While the happy couple is content to focus on their professional goals for the moment, Ren’s legion of fans won’t rest until they know what’s going on with their fav. Are any secrets safe from these internet detectives?!
author: Yoshiki Nakamura
